p: The PPI network of the DceRBPs was established by using the STRING database, which incorporated 134 nodes and 315 edges (Figure 3A). Then, we searched the hub genes from the PPI network by using the MCC algorithm of CytoHubba plugin (Figure 3B). According to the MCC score, the top 30 highest-scored genes were selected as the hub RBP genes ( Table S4).
